T09kbavk64u:3: mahatāṃ maṇivimalānāṃ api bhavati na rāgasaṃkrāntiḥ // KAvk_64.1 //
T09kbavk64u:4: śākyālaye darśanam eva pitrā sarvānukampī bhṛśam arthyamānaḥ yadā yadānandasudhārasendur viveśa śāstā nijarājadhānīṃ // KAvk_64.2 //
T09kbavk64u:6: kāntyā diśāṃ vismayam ullikhantaṃ yaśodharā taṃ dayitaṃ vilokya //
T09kbavk64u:8: dhṛtiṃ vayasyām iva vārayantīṃ nirasya saudhāt tanum utsasarja //
T09kbavk64u:9: yadā yadā pallavapeśalāṅgī dehaṃ samutsṛṣṭavatī satī sā /
T09kbavk64u:10: tadā tadā manmathamohitāṃ tāṃ dayārdracakṣur bhagavān rarakṣa // KAvk_64.5
T09kbavk64u:11: tataḥ kadā cid bhagavān vanānte tatkautukād bhikṣugaṇena pṛṣṭaḥ /
T09kbavk64u:12: jagāda dantadyuticandrikābhir nivārayan rāgam ivādharasya // KAvk_64.6 //
T09kbavk64u:13: yaśodharā madviraheṇa nityaṃ karoti yat sāhasam etad ārtā /
T09kbavk64u:14: haranti dhairyaṃ vitaranti mohaṃ eṣa svabhāvaḥ smaravibhramāṇāṃ //
T09kbavk64u:15: mayāpi tasyā viraheṇa pūrvaṃ janmāntare māravimohitena /
T09kbavk64u:20: lakṣmīḥ prasādhitā yena kīrtir eva pravāsitā // KAvk_64.10 //
T09kbavk64u:24: kalāvān nirmalarucir yaḥ pūrṇendur ivābabhau // KAvk_64.12 //
T09kbavk64u:30: tīvropatāpasaṃtapte pure na vavṛṣur ghanāḥ // KAvk_64.15 //
T09kbavk64u:32: babhūva vyasaneṣv eva bhavanti vyasanodayāḥ // KAvk_64.16 //
T09kbavk64u:41: sutīkṣṇaḥ kṣmāpālaḥ kharamukharamūrkhaḥ parijanaḥ kadaryāś cāmātyāḥ kaṭukapaṭakauṭilyapaṭavaḥ
T09kbavk64u:42: padasthāḥ kāyasthā viṣamamukharogāḥ prakupitāḥ kathaṃ sahyaḥ so 'yaṃ kṛpaṇadalano dāruṇagaṇaḥ dhanaḥ śrimān kṣitipatiḥ śrūyate rāṣṭravardhanaḥ /
T09kbavk64u:43: gacchāmas tatpuraṃ so 'smān vatsalaḥ pālayiṣyati // KAvk_64.22 //
T09kbavk64u:44: apatyam iva rāṣṭraṃ yaḥ sadā paśyati bhūpatiḥ /
T09kbavk64u:45: viṣaye jīvyate tasya janakasyeva veśmani // KAvk_64.23 //
T09kbavk64u:46: iti niścayam ādhāya yayus te hastināpuraṃ /
T09kbavk64u:47: tyājyaḥ kāyo 'pi sāpāyaḥ kiṃ punar deśasaṃśrayaḥ // KAvk_64.24 //
T09kbavk64u:51: prayātā iti naś cāraiḥ kathitaṃ gūḍhacāribhiḥ // KAvk_64.26 //
T09kbavk64u:52: durbhikṣakhinnā yadi te yātā mama ripoḥ puram /
T09kbavk64u:53: tat sarvatra bhavanty eva paryāyair devaviplavāḥ // KAvk_64.27 //
T09kbavk64u:54: atha vā rājadoṣena gatās te sukhavāñchayā /
T09kbavk64u:55: viṣṭidaṇḍakaronmuktaḥ kasya rājñaḥ pure janaḥ // KAvk_64.28 //
T09kbavk64u:57: dūrastha eva sarvasya sarvo bhavati vallabhaḥ // KAvk_64.29 //
T09kbavk64u:59: pareṣāṃ harate yena mugdhā jāyā iva prajāḥ // KAvk_64.30 //
T09kbavk64u:61: samṛddhikāraṇaṃ yac ca tadvighāto vidhīyatāṃ // KAvk_64.31 //
T09kbavk64u:63: śrūyatāṃ deva yenāsau rājā dhanajanorjitaḥ // KAvk_64.32 //
T09kbavk64u:65: tasya kṣitipater mūrtaḥ puṇyabaddha ivodayaḥ // KAvk_64.33 //
T09kbavk64u:68: tasmād vidyābalān nāgaḥ sa hartuṃ yadi śakyate /
T09kbavk64u:69: tadā yānti svayaṃ tasya prajās tvām eva saṃśrayam // KAvk_64.35 //
T09kbavk64u:70: dīptamantrabalaṃ kaṃ cit tasmād anviṣya sādhakam /
T09kbavk64u:71: nāgarājasya haraṇe kriyatāṃ tūrṇam udyamaḥ // KAvk_64.36 //
T09kbavk64u:72: ity amātyavacaḥ śrutvā tathety āha mahīpatiḥ /
T09kbavk64u:75: kṛtvā te mantriṇaḥ prāpur nāgabandhanamantriṇam // KAvk_64.38 //
T09kbavk64u:77: prārthitaś citram ānetuṃ prayayau hastināpuram // KAvk_64.39 //
T09kbavk64u:79: bhavanaṃ bhogināṃ bhartuḥ sa dadarśa nabhaḥprabham // KAvk_64.40 //
T09kbavk64u:91: badhnāty eṣa na yāvan māṃ tāvad yuktikramaḥ kṣamaḥ // KAvk_64.46 //
T09kbavk64u:93: jāne so 'pi na me sādhu paritrāṇe pragalbhate // KAvk_64.47 //
T09kbavk64u:95: lubdhakaḥ padmako nāma sa me saṃrakṣaṇakṣamaḥ // KAvk_64.48 //
T09kbavk64u:96: iti niścitya manasā sa gatvā lubdhakāntikam /
T09kbavk64u:99: dhanvī taṃ deśam abhyetya mantradhīraṃ vyalokayat // KAvk_64.50 //
T09kbavk64u:105: rakṣārthanām iva cakāra taraṅgahastasaktāñjali prabalakampavilolam ambhaḥ
T09kbavk64u:109: vivyādha dhanur ākṛṣya viṣadigdhena lubdhakaḥ // KAvk_64.55 //
T09kbavk64u:113: abhūt siddhāpi mugdhasya svavināśāya kevalam // KAvk_64.57 //
T09kbavk64u:117: taṃ nināya svabhavanaṃ lubdhakaṃ snehalubdhadhīḥ // KAvk_64.59 //
T09kbavk64u:119: abhyarcyamānaś citreṇa kaṃ cit kālam uvāsa saḥ // KAvk_64.60 //
T09kbavk64u:120: kadā cid atha nāgena pūjyamānaṃ savismayaḥ /
T09kbavk64u:121: vidyuddāmopamaṃ pāśam amoghākhyaṃ dadarśa saḥ // KAvk_64.61 //
T09kbavk64u:122: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tatprabhāvaṃ ca śrutvā nāganiveditam /
T09kbavk64u:123: yatnāt tadarthanāṃ cakre lubdhako lubdhamānasaḥ // KAvk_64.62 //
T09kbavk64u:125: taṃ jīvitādhikaṃ tasmai dadau prītyā phaṇīśvaraḥ // KAvk_64.63 //
T09kbavk64u:126: tatas taṃ pāśam ādāya citram āmantrya lubdhakaḥ /
T09kbavk64u:127: uttīrya nāgabhavanāl labdhārthaḥ svapadaṃ yayau // KAvk_64.64 //
T09kbavk64u:132: tataḥ kadā cit sa muner viśrāntasya sthitaḥ puraḥ /
T09kbavk64u:135: citranyastam ivālokya so 'pṛcchad vismito munim // KAvk_64.68 //
T09kbavk64u:138: iti lubdhakaputreṇa pṛṣṭas taṃ munir abravīt /
T09kbavk64u:141: pañcabhir nāgabhavane krīḍaty eṣā manoharā // KAvk_64.71 //
T09kbavk64u:142: śrutvaitat kautukākrāntaḥ sa punar munim abhyadhāt /
T09kbavk64u:143: api śaknoti puruṣaḥ prāptuṃ kinnarakanyakām // KAvk_64.72 //
T09kbavk64u:144: tam uvāca munir yasya bhavet pāśaḥ karāgragaḥ /
T09kbavk64u:145: amoghākhyaḥ sa śaknoti hartuṃ kinnarakāminīm // KAvk_64.73 //
T09kbavk64u:146: etad ākarṇya sotsāhas taṃ praṇamyātha lubdhakaḥ /
T09kbavk64u:150: madbye snānotthitāṃ tāsāṃ sa dadarśa manoharām /
T09kbavk64u:163: cakre pāśam amoghākhyaṃ sajjaṃ sapadi lubdhakaḥ // KAvk_64.82 //
T09kbavk64u:165: kinnaryo divam utpetuḥ pāśahastaṃ vilokya taṃ // KAvk_64.83 //
T09kbavk64u:167: manoharāṃ sa jagrāha hariṇīm iva lubdhakaḥ // KAvk_64.84 //
T09kbavk64u:168: sā pāśavivaśā tena kṛṣṭā kaṣṭadaśāṃ śritā /
T09kbavk64u:169: kim etad iti nājñāsīt kṣaṇamūrcchānimīlitā // KAvk_64.85 //
T09kbavk64u:171: nirīkṣamāṇā kakubhaḥ sā saṃbhrāntā tam abhyadhāt // KAvk_64.86 //
T09kbavk64u:172: muñca muñca dṛḍhākṣiptāṃ mā sprākṣīḥ parirakṣa mām /
T09kbavk64u:173: krūrā api bhavanty eva śokārtiṣu kṛpālavaḥ // KAvk_64.87 //
T09kbavk64u:175: sadyaḥ pradīptā vidyeva nirdahaty eva sādhakam // KAvk_64.88 //
T09kbavk64u:176: māṃ vicārya dhiyā dhīmann ucitāya prayacchataḥ /
T09kbavk64u:178: pīḍāṃ pāśakṛtām etāṃ na sahe muñca bandhanam /
T09kbavk64u:179: svayaṃ vrajāmy ahaṃ tatra yatra te 'bhimatā gatiḥ // KAvk_64.90 //
T09kbavk64u:180: divam utplutya gacchāmi na tv ahaṃ muktabandhanā /
T09kbavk64u:181: yadvaśān me gatir vyomni cūḍāratnaṃ gṛhāṇa tat // KAvk_64.91 //
T09kbavk64u:182: ity uktaḥ sa tayā sāsraṃ prayātaḥ karuṇārdratām /
T09kbavk64u:183: cūḍāmaṇiṃ samādāya pāśaṃ muktvā jagāda tām // KAvk_64.92 //
T09kbavk64u:184: samāśvasihi kalyāṇi na śokaṃ kartum arhasi /
T09kbavk64u:185: na nāmānucitāya tvāṃ prayacchāmi nijecchayā // KAvk_64.93 //
T09kbavk64u:187: pūritāḥ kakubhaḥ sarvā yena kīrtyamṛtormibhiḥ // KAvk_64.94 //
T09kbavk64u:190: sa te samucitaḥ subhru vibhramābharaṇaṃ bhuvaḥ /
T09kbavk64u:197: prasthitaḥ sudhano dhanvī śanais taṃ deśam āyayau // KAvk_64.99 //
T09kbavk64u:203: harann iva rajaḥpuñjaṃ vyājahāra sa sārathim // KAvk_64.102 //
T09kbavk64u:205: dūrojjhitā svasainyena kiyatī laṅghitā kṣitiḥ // KAvk_64.103 //
T09kbavk64u:209: sotkaṇṭhā iva jṛmbhante mañjaryaḥ śvasanākulāḥ // KAvk_64.105 //
T09kbavk64u:215: paśyanti dantiśiśavaḥ parito rathaṃ me nemisvanāpaḥrtacāpalalīnakarṇāḥ //
T09kbavk64u:221: śuśrāva nirjane kīrṇaṃ kinnaryāḥ karuṇaṃ svanam // KAvk_64.110 //
T09kbavk64u:223: so 'bhyetya sadguṇādarśas tāṃ dadarśa mṛgīdṛśam // KAvk_64.111 //
T09kbavk64u:227: khinnām iva vanabhrāntyā lakṣmīṃ hariṇalakṣmaṇaḥ // KAvk_64.113 //
T09kbavk64u:234: tāruṇyena nipītaśaiśavatayā sānaṅgaśṛṅgāriṇī tanvaṅgyā sakalāṅgasaṃgamasakhī bhaṅgir navāṅgīkṛtā
T09kbavk64u:235: niḥsaṃrambhaparākramaḥ pṛthutarārambhābhiyogaṃ vinā sāṃrājye jagatāṃ yayā vijayate devo vilāsāyudhaḥ iti vismayagarbheṇa sābhilāṣeṇa cakṣuṣa /
T09kbavk64u:236: tāṃ pibantam ivābhyetya praṇamya prāha lubdhakaḥ // KAvk_64.118 //
T09kbavk64u:240: tvam evāsyā guṇodāra bhartā bhuva ivocitaḥ // KAvk_64.120 //
T09kbavk64u:242: gṛhītas tadvirahitā neyaṃ yāti vihāyasā // KAvk_64.121 //
T09kbavk64u:243: rakṣyo maṇir ayaṃ nāsti datte 'smin saṃgamo 'nayā /
T09kbavk64u:244: ity uktvāsmai dadau kanyāratnaṃ ratnaṃ ca lubdhakaḥ // KAvk_64.122 //
T09kbavk64u:249: kinnarīṃ ratham āropya ratnair āpūrya lubdhakam /
T09kbavk64u:251: sa hastināpuraṃ prāpya nivedya svakathāṃ pituḥ /
T09kbavk64u:252: harṣād vismayinā tena vivāhe vihitotsavaḥ // KAvk_64.126 //
T09kbavk64u:253: sukṛtair bhogyatāṃ yātāṃ mūrtām iva śaśiśriyam /
T09kbavk64u:256: spṛṣṭā natamukhāmbhojā cakampe nalinīva sā // KAvk_64.128 //
T09kbavk64u:258: vailakṣye 'pi sphuṭallakṣmīṃ tasyāḥ prītiṃ tatāna saḥ // KAvk_64.129 //
T09kbavk64u:262: vivāda iva sotkampaṃ kaṅkaṇasvanayor abhūt // KAvk_64.131 //
T09kbavk64u:266: ājagmatur vṛttikāmau dhanasya nṛpateḥ sabhām // KAvk_64.133 //
T09kbavk64u:272: vidadhe madalekheva vidyā malinatām mukhe // KAvk_64.136 //
T09kbavk64u:273: yeṣāṃ vastuvivekinī guṇasakhī lokaprakāśonmukhī vidyādīpaśikhā karoti viṣamaṃ dveṣāndhakāraṃ puraḥ /
T09kbavk64u:274: te mohopahatā vicārarahitāḥ saujanyajanyāhitā dagdhāś candanacandrakāntakamalasyandodgatenāgninā śrutismṛtivivādeṣu puṣkareṇa pade pade /
T09kbavk64u:277: sadā saṃsadi mām eva nayaty eṣa vilakṣatām // KAvk_64.139 //
T09kbavk64u:281: tasmād āśrayam evāsya śrīmūlam praharāmy aham // KAvk_64.141 //
T09kbavk64u:283: yuktaḥ kartuṃ prayatno me mānamlāniṃ kathaṃ sahe // KAvk_64.142 //
T09kbavk64u:285: nāsti tat pātakaṃ loke yan na kurvanti matsarāḥ // KAvk_64.143 //
T09kbavk64u:286: kathaṃ paśyati sadvartma sa sadā vyathitāśayaḥ /
T09kbavk64u:288: rāgaḥ pāpaṃ paramam adhikaṃ darpapāpaṃ tato 'pi
T09kbavk64u:289: krodhāt pāpaṃ jagati na paraṃ duḥsahaṃ lobhapāpam /
T09kbavk64u:290: yāvān eṣa vyasanini jane gaṇyate pāpavargaḥ pāpāṃśasya spṛśati na tulāṃ so 'pi vidveṣasūteḥ tataḥ kadā cin meghākhyaṃ krūraṃ karvaṭavāsinam /
T09kbavk64u:293: amātyānāṃ anumate kumāram idam abravīt // KAvk_64.147 //
T09kbavk64u:294: kumāra gamyatāṃ tūrṇam ucchettuṃ tarasā ripum /
T09kbavk64u:295: kramopapannaṃ sāṃrājyaṃ niḥśalyam idam astu te // KAvk_64.148 //
T09kbavk64u:299: hate tava pratāpasya nirvighnāvaraṇā diśaḥ // KAvk_64.150 //
T09kbavk64u:300: durbalaiḥ kiṃ hatair anyaiḥ sāmantair antavāsibhiḥ /
T09kbavk64u:301: dṛptaḥ sa eva hantavyas tadvadhe sarvasiddhayaḥ // KAvk_64.151 //
T09kbavk64u:302: kiṃ kautukaṃ yadi hariḥ karicakravālaṃ āhanti daivavihitam nijam eva bhojyam /
T09kbavk64u:303: pañcānanaṃ yadi bhinatti nakhāṭṭahāsaṃ tat tasya pauruṣakathāpatham eti śauryam // KAvk_64.152
T09kbavk64u:307: jananīṃ svairam abhyetya praṇipatya jagāda saḥ // KAvk_64.154 //
T09kbavk64u:311: dātavyaḥ sarvathā mātar nānyatra prāṇasaṃśayāt // KAvk_64.156 //
T09kbavk64u:313: nikṣipya sa yayau tūrṇaṃ sainyācchāditadiṅmukhaḥ // KAvk_64.157 //
T09kbavk64u:318: sotkaṇṭhāyā divasagaṇanārambhanityābhiyoge saṃkhyālekhāsaraṇim avanau kampalolaṃ likhantyāḥ
T09kbavk64u:319: tasyāḥ pāṇau nipatitaraṇatkaṅkaṇe tānavena kṣipraṃ muktāvalayakalanām aśrudhārā cakāra // dveṣaḥ puṣpaśare sukhe vimukhatā dehe 'pi niḥsnehatā patyau dhyānaparāyaṇatvam aniśaṃ tannāmamantro japaḥ /
T09kbavk64u:320: śayyā bhūmitalaṃ tathāpi sutanos tāpakṣatir nābhavan nūnaṃ niścalalīnarāgamanasāṃ muktir na tīvravrataiḥ // KAvk_64.161 //
T09kbavk64u:322: candralekheva sā tanvī jyotsnāmadhyagatā babhau // KAvk_64.162 //
T09kbavk64u:324: purohitaṃ samāhūya papraccha kapilaṃ rahaḥ // KAvk_64.163 //
T09kbavk64u:325: dṛṣṭaṃ adya mayā svapne niruddhaṃ śatrubhiḥ puram /
T09kbavk64u:328: vicintaya śubhodarkām ucitāṃ ca pratikriyām // KAvk_64.165 //
T09kbavk64u:329: iti pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitīśena kṣaṇam antaḥ purohitaḥ /
T09kbavk64u:333: priyā manoharā jyeṣṭhaṃ jīvitaṃ tasya kinnarī /
T09kbavk64u:334: abhāve niyataṃ tasyā na sa jīvati duḥkhitaḥ // KAvk_64.168 //
T09kbavk64u:338: dṛṣṭaḥ spaṣṭaṃ phalaṃ tasya duḥsahaṃ katham ucyate // KAvk_64.170 //
T09kbavk64u:340: na karṇakaṭukaṃ vaktuṃ niṣedho 'sti hitaiṣiṇām // KAvk_64.171 //
T09kbavk64u:341: rājyāt bhraṃśaḥ śarīrād vā svapnasyāsya phalaṃ sphuṭam /
T09kbavk64u:344: snātas tvaṃ mārjito viprair bhūriratnasuvarṇadaḥ // KAvk_64.173 //
T09kbavk64u:346: antaḥpure snuṣā te 'sti kinnarī na tu durlabhā // KAvk_64.174 //
T09kbavk64u:347: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā krūraṃ pātakakūṇitaḥ /
T09kbavk64u:350: kinnarīvirahe 'vaśyaṃ na ca jīvati me sutaḥ // KAvk_64.176 //
T09kbavk64u:352: taṃ pāpābhiniveśena punaḥ prāha purohitaḥ // KAvk_64.177 //
T09kbavk64u:353: aho rājan na jānīṣe dhīmān api janasthitim /
T09kbavk64u:354: trivargasādhanaṃ tyājyam na rājyaṃ na ca jīvitaṃ // KAvk_64.178 //
T09kbavk64u:355: arthā iva svajanamitrakalatraputrā naṣṭāḥ sthitasya puruṣasya punar bhavanti /
T09kbavk64u:356: ucchvāsamātravirahe gatajīvitasya tatkālasaṃnihitam apy asad eva sarvam //
T09kbavk64u:358: jīvitād aparaṃ rājañ jīvaloke 'sti na priyam // KAvk_64.180 //
T09kbavk64u:360: pratāritaḥ pāpaṃ rājā yuktam amanyata // KAvk_64.181 //
T09kbavk64u:362: kṛtāyāṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ ca pūrṇāyāṃ paśuśoṇitaiḥ // KAvk_64.182 //
T09kbavk64u:370: snuṣāpi hanyate rājñā tat kiṃ vakṣyāmy ahaṃ sutam // KAvk_64.186 //
T09kbavk64u:371: mātas tvayeyaṃ vātsalyāt pālyā mama manoharā /
T09kbavk64u:372: ity uktvā sudhanaḥ sūnur gato nikṣipya me vadhūm // KAvk_64.187 //
T09kbavk64u:373: tasmāc cūḍāmaṇim mattaḥ prāpya vyomnā prayātu sā /
T09kbavk64u:374: bhaviṣyati tayā patyur jīvantyā saṃgamaḥ punaḥ // KAvk_64.188 //
T09kbavk64u:375: iti saṃcintya sā gatvā sāśrunetrā snuṣāntikam /
T09kbavk64u:376: rājavṛttaṃ nivedyāsyai sotkampā punar abravīt // KAvk_64.189 //
T09kbavk64u:377: vatse cūḍāmaṇiṃ baddhvā gaccha tūrṇaṃ vihāyasā /
T09kbavk64u:378: nṛpaḥ pāpapravṛtto 'yaṃ na sadācāram īkṣate // KAvk_64.190 //
T09kbavk64u:380: anyathā tvām asau vetti gūḍhanyastāṃ mayā kva cit // KAvk_64.191 //
T09kbavk64u:382: tatsaṃgamāya rakṣantī yatnāt priyataraṃ vapuḥ // KAvk_64.192 //
T09kbavk64u:383: śvaśrvā dattaṃ samādāya baddhvā mūrdhni śikhāmaṇim /
T09kbavk64u:384: nṛpāhūtā kratukṣetraṃ gatvā vyoma vyagāhata // KAvk_64.193 //
T09kbavk64u:385: rājan naitat tava samucitaṃ yat priyasyāpi sūnor vadhyā patnī nijapadam iyaṃ svasti tubhyaṃ gatāham /
T09kbavk64u:386: rakṣyaś cāsau pratihatadhṛtir madviyoge kumāras tatrety uktvā tanutaratadidvibhramaiḥ sā jagāma tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ nṛpatir yajñavighnena śaṅkitaḥ purohitas tam avadad deva mā saṃśayaṃ kṛthāḥ mantrair mayā samākṛṣṭaḥ krūrākhyo brahmarākṣasaḥ /
T09kbavk64u:387: nirvighnas te kratuḥ siddhaḥ sā hatā tena kinnarī // KAvk_64.196 //
T09kbavk64u:388: iti mithyāvacas tasya rājā satyam amanyata /
T09kbavk64u:391: nyavedayat svavṛttāntaṃ vahantī vallabhaṃ hṛdi // KAvk_64.198 //
T09kbavk64u:393: hemakumbhaśataiḥ snānaṃ pañcabhiḥ pratyahaṃ vyadhāt // KAvk_64.199 //
T09kbavk64u:395: sudhanasnehasaṃyogī na tu rāgo mṛgīdṛśaḥ // KAvk_64.200 //
T09kbavk64u:397: anyatra baddharāgāṇāṃ ratir nānyatra dehinām // KAvk_64.201 //
T09kbavk64u:403: tvam eva brūhi bhagavan yadi yuktam idaṃ kṛtam // KAvk_64.204 //
T09kbavk64u:405: tām uvāca munir mugdhe tavaiṣā bhavitavyatā // KAvk_64.205 //
T09kbavk64u:407: upalabhya kathāṃ dhūrtas tvāṃ babandha sa lubdhakaḥ // KAvk_64.206 //
T09kbavk64u:410: ity uktā muninā tanvī praṇayāt tam abhāṣata /
T09kbavk64u:412: idaṃ tu bhavatām agre yan mayā kiṃ cid ucyate /
T09kbavk64u:417: kāryāntaraṅgāḥ prāyeṇa bhavanty anuciteṣv api // KAvk_64.211 //
T09kbavk64u:421: amunā yadi mārgeṇa sameṣyati tavāntikam // KAvk_64.213 //
T09kbavk64u:422: tad idaṃ bhavatā vācyaṃ kāruṇyād vacasā mama /
T09kbavk64u:424: utkaṇṭhām anukampāṃ vā sahajāṃ vā kṛtajñatām /
T09kbavk64u:425: dākṣiṇyaṃ vā puraskṛtya tūrṇam āgamyatām itaḥ // KAvk_64.215 //
T09kbavk64u:429: dṛśyate haviṣā paktvā pātavyā sā svayaṃ tvayā // KAvk_64.217 //
T09kbavk64u:433: ity uktvā viṣamaṃ vartma kathayitvā krameṇa sā // KAvk_64.219 //
T09kbavk64u:437: aṅgulīyakam ādāya tad evācintayan muniḥ // KAvk_64.221 //
T09kbavk64u:443: athāntaḥpuram abhyetya janakaṃ praṇanāma saḥ // KAvk_64.224 //
T09kbavk64u:445: pitur antaḥpuraṃ dṛṣṭvā sa vipriyam aśaṅkata // KAvk_64.225 //
T09kbavk64u:446: api jīvati sā tanvī virahārtā manoharā /
T09kbavk64u:447: iti bruvāṇaṃ na yadā tam ūce kaś cid apriyam // KAvk_64.226 //
T09kbavk64u:448: tadā jagāda jananī putra jīvati te priyā /
T09kbavk64u:449: gatā cūḍāmaṇiṃ prāpya kiṃ tu jīvitasaṃśaye // KAvk_64.227 //
T09kbavk64u:450: iti śrutvaiva sahasā sa papāta mahītale /
T09kbavk64u:451: kīrṇahāralatāṃ kurvan sāśrudhārām iva kṣitim // KAvk_64.228 //
T09kbavk64u:457: vihitā na dhṛtir mayā mṛgākṣyās tad ayaṃ me patitaḥ smarābhiśāpaḥ //
T09kbavk64u:458: dehi prativacaḥ subhru kva gatāsi manohare /
T09kbavk64u:459: mayā pramādamūḍhena hariṇākṣī na rakṣitā // KAvk_64.232 //
T09kbavk64u:461: mameva martyalokasya tvadviyuktasya kā dyutiḥ // KAvk_64.233 //
T09kbavk64u:463: udyāneṣu priyatamāṃ vicetuṃ svayam udyayau // KAvk_64.234 //
T09kbavk64u:465: gatvā vanāntaṃ babhrāma sameṣu viṣameṣu ca // KAvk_64.235 //
T09kbavk64u:467: unmatta iva papraccha cetanācetanān api // KAvk_64.236 //
T09kbavk64u:468: brūhi sakhe śukaśāvaka sakhyuḥ prāṇasakhīṃ nikhilendumukhīṃ tām /
T09kbavk64u:469: taddaśanacchadarāgavibhāge bimbaphale 'stu sadā tava bhogaḥ // KAvk_64.237
T09kbavk64u:470: haṃho haṃsa sitāṃsa śaṃsa nalinīlīlāvataṃsadyute dṛṣṭā saurabhasadmapadmavadanā kiṃ kāntikallolinī
T09kbavk64u:471: yasyāḥ pīnapayodharāgraviluṭhanmuktākalāpasya sā haṃsasyeva vibhāti romalatikā śaivālavallī cyutā // KAvk_64.238 //
T09kbavk64u:473: diśan prakāśaṃ dayayeva mārge śanair jagāhe gaganaṃ sitāṃśuḥ //
T09kbavk64u:474: śyāmāpater manmathabāndhavasya kāntaṃ sa dṛṣṭvāmbaracumbi bimbam /
T09kbavk64u:475: saṃdarśitaṃ sasmitam indumukhyā mene mukhaṃ vyomavimānaśrṅgāt //
T09kbavk64u:477: cireṇa niścitya śaśāṅkam eva papraccha gacchan naranāthasūnuḥ //
T09kbavk64u:478: api tvayā kāntisakhī sakhe khe tulyekṣaṇā lakṣmaṃrgasya dṛṣṭā /
T09kbavk64u:480: kathaṃ na kiṃ cit kathayaty ayaṃ me gatasya kāntākathanārthibhāvam /
T09kbavk64u:482: api tvayā snigdhataḍitprakāśā ghanastanī kvāpi mayūra dṛṣṭā /
T09kbavk64u:483: tvadbarhabhārasya suhṛt sa yasyā vicitramālyaḥ kabarīkalāpaḥ //
T09kbavk64u:484: bhujaṃga kac cid bhavatā bhujaṃgī dṛṣṭā kva cit sā vararatnacūḍā /
T09kbavk64u:485: viṣacchaṭāḥ paśya yayā visṛṣṭā māṃ duḥsahe 'smin virahe dahanti //
T09kbavk64u:486: sāraṅga sā raṅgavilāsinī kiṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā manmathapārthivasya /
T09kbavk64u:487: yasyāḥ kaṭākṣotpalasaṃvibhāgair vibhānti manye gahane hariṇyaḥ //
T09kbavk64u:489: līlāvilolā lalanā vanānte lateva dṛṣṭā stabakāvanaṃrā // KAvk_64.247 //
T09kbavk64u:490: anena nūnaṃ vanakuñjareṇa sā rājarambhā parirambhalobhāt /
T09kbavk64u:491: ākṛṣya nītā ghanasaṃnibhena saṃcchāditā vā śaśinaḥ kaleva // KAvk_64.248
T09kbavk64u:493: śokād iva vivarṇenduvadanā rajanī yayau // KAvk_64.249 //
T09kbavk64u:495: śanaiḥ praviśya papraccha maharṣiṃ valkalāyanaṃ // KAvk_64.250 //
T09kbavk64u:497: api śamitaśaśāṅkoddāmasaundaryadarpā munivara hariṇākṣī kinnarī kāpi dṛṣṭā
T09kbavk64u:499: muniḥ śrutvā vacas tasya parijñāya tam abravīt // KAvk_64.252 //
T09kbavk64u:501: dṛṣṭā sā tava kalyāṇī mayā mānasacandrikā // KAvk_64.253 //
T09kbavk64u:503: pāśākṛṣṭeva kariṇī dhāryate sā tvadāśayā // KAvk_64.254 //
T09kbavk64u:504: pāṇau śete vadanakamalaṃ prastare pallavānāṃ tāpaklāntā taralavalanasraṃsinī gātralekhā /
T09kbavk64u:505: āśābandhe dhṛtir iva mates tvadviyogākulāyās tasyā naiva kva cid api manaḥ kiṃ tu viśrāntim eti // KAvk_64.255 //
T09kbavk64u:507: āgantavyaṃ tvayā tūrṇam iti tvāṃ saṃdideśa sā // KAvk_64.256 //
T09kbavk64u:509: agamye kinnarapure kramād vartma śaśaṃsa ca // KAvk_64.257 //
T09kbavk64u:510: idaṃ ca tvatkṛte dattaṃ tayā ratnāṅgulīyakam /
T09kbavk64u:511: yasya snigdhaprabhābhyaṅgair diśo yānti piśaṅgatām // KAvk_64.258 //
T09kbavk64u:513: aṅgulīyaṃ dadau tasmai mārgaṃ cākathayan muniḥ // KAvk_64.259 //
T09kbavk64u:515: dhīraḥ pracakrame gantuṃ dhanadādhyuṣitāṃ diśam // KAvk_64.260 //
T09kbavk64u:516: sa siddhāṃ ghṛtapākena sudhāṃ pītvā mahauṣadhim /
T09kbavk64u:521: himavantam atikramya kukūlādrim avāpa saḥ // KAvk_64.263 //
T09kbavk64u:523: vāyuvegākhyam āruhya sa taṃ śailam alaṅghayat // KAvk_64.264 //
T09kbavk64u:533: sa pādamūle tasyādres tasthau niścalavigrahaḥ // KAvk_64.269 //
T09kbavk64u:536: mṛgacarma samutsṛjya tāṃ nihatya sa vīryavān /
T09kbavk64u:538: praviśya tadguhāṃ lebhe śilāṃ vyasya mahauṣadhim /
T09kbavk64u:541: yantrakīlaṃ śarāgreṇa chittvā cakre viniścalau // KAvk_64.273 //
T09kbavk64u:543: chedanam yantracakraṃ ca yantrayuktau tathāyasau // KAvk_64.274 //
T09kbavk64u:547: tuṅgāṃ saritam uttīrya hatvā tatkūlarākṣasān // KAvk_64.276 //
T09kbavk64u:549: rodinīṃ ca nadīṃ tīre yasyāḥ kinnaraceṭikāḥ // KAvk_64.277 //
T09kbavk64u:553: laṅghayitvāpagāś cānyā vetrāṃ prāpya nadīṃ tataḥ // KAvk_64.279 //
T09kbavk64u:558: praviśya sa śanaiḥ prapya kāntāṃ kanakapadminīm /
T09kbavk64u:561: hemakumbhair jalaṃ tatra nayantīḥ kinnarāṅganāḥ // KAvk_64.283 //
T09kbavk64u:563: hastālambena sāhāyyaṃ kṛtvā papraccha tārn śanaiḥ // KAvk_64.284 //
T09kbavk64u:564: mātaḥ kasya kṛte toyaṃ idaṃ yatnena nīyate /
T09kbavk64u:565: yadbhaktyā gaṇyate nāyaṃ bhavatībhiḥ pariśramaḥ // KAvk_64.285 //
T09kbavk64u:566: iti tena priyagirā sā pṛṣṭā tam abhāṣata /
T09kbavk64u:569: pituḥ kinnararājasya girā snāti manoharā // KAvk_64.287 //
T09kbavk64u:570: tayeti kathitaṃ śrutvā sudhāsikta iva kṣaṇāt /
T09kbavk64u:572: snāntyās tatas tad abhihāri manoharāyāḥ kumbhāt papāta kucakumbhayuge 'ṅgulīyam /
T09kbavk64u:574: mūrtaṃ tataḥ svaṃ anurāgam ivākalayya ratnāṅgulīyakam anaṅgakathāntaraṅgam /
T09kbavk64u:575: sā kāntam āgatam avetya kutas tvayedaṃ saṃprāptam ity avadad ucchaliteva dāsīm // KAvk_64.290
T09kbavk64u:576: tatas tām avadad dāsī devi puṣkariṇītaṭe /
T09kbavk64u:577: sthitaḥ ko 'pi yuvā kāntaḥ pratyakṣa iva manmathaḥ // KAvk_64.291 //
T09kbavk64u:580: iti tadvacanaṃ tanvī priyaṃ śrutvā manoharā /
T09kbavk64u:581: niścitya dayitaṃ prāptam ānināya tayaiva tam // KAvk_64.293 //
T09kbavk64u:585: tayoḥ praharṣānubhavena lebhe śobhām aśeṣāṅgavatīm anaṅgaḥ // KAvk_64.295
T09kbavk64u:586: yad yat kiṃ cid virahasamaye cintayābhyastam antar yad yat prauḍhapramadasuhṛdā manmathenopadiṣṭam
T09kbavk64u:587: yad yat premṇaḥ sadṛśam ucitaṃ yad yad autsukyarāśes tat tat sarvaṃ praṇayasubhagaṃ dampatī cakratus tau // KAvk_64.296 //
T09kbavk64u:593: na vimuñcasi durvṛtte kṣālyamānāpi raktatām // KAvk_64.299 //
T09kbavk64u:595: bata prayātam etat te martyasnehena śocyatāṃ // KAvk_64.300 //
T09kbavk64u:597: nimnage kṣobhavibhraṣṭā yātāsi sutarām adhaḥ // KAvk_64.301 //
T09kbavk64u:599: malinā khalavidyeva saṃmatāsi na kasya cit // KAvk_64.302 //
T09kbavk64u:600: rūpamātreṇa tuṣṭā tvaṃ yadi martyavaśaṃ gatā /
T09kbavk64u:601: tat kiṃ na ramase hemanirmāṇapuruṣatviṣā // KAvk_64.303 //
T09kbavk64u:605: mukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ na śaknomi tvadyācñāptadivaukasām // KAvk_64.305 //
T09kbavk64u:607: jareva kila kāyasya kanyā saṃkocakāriṇī // KAvk_64.306 //
T09kbavk64u:608: iti sā bhartsitā pitrā tam uvāca natānanā /
T09kbavk64u:610: kopād anucitaṃ tāta naitan māṃ vaktum arhasi /
T09kbavk64u:611: na śrūyante prabhāveṇa kiṃ narāḥ kinnarādhikāḥ // KAvk_64.308 //
T09kbavk64u:612: garuḍasyāpi durlaṅghyām imām ullaṅghya yaḥ kṣitim /
T09kbavk64u:613: prabhāvabhūmir āyāti manuṣyaḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet // KAvk_64.309 //
T09kbavk64u:615: karoty ānanda saṃvādaṃ dyutir eva himatviṣaḥ // KAvk_64.310 //
T09kbavk64u:616: jātyā kiṃ kriyate tāta svabhāvānuguṇā guṇāḥ /
T09kbavk64u:618: bhavanty antarguṇāḥ ke cic channadoṣās tathāpare /
T09kbavk64u:619: aparīkṣya na kartavyā maṇīnāṃ mūlyalaṅghanā // KAvk_64.312 //
T09kbavk64u:620: śrutvaitat kinnarapatis tat tatheti vicintya ca /
T09kbavk64u:622: tvayā kāntyā jitās tāvad ete kinnaradārakāḥ /
T09kbavk64u:625: vyuptam anyūnam uccitya punar dehi tilādhakam // KAvk_64.315 //
T09kbavk64u:628: ity aśakye 'pi kauṭilyāt preritas tena karmaṇi /
T09kbavk64u:629: sarvaṃ kāntānurāgeṇa kumāraḥ kartum udyayau // KAvk_64.317 //
T09kbavk64u:631: taṃ vijñāya sahasrākṣaḥ pakṣapātād acintayat // KAvk_64.318 //
T09kbavk64u:635: iti saṃcintya śakro 'sya karmaniṣpattim ādadhe // KAvk_64.320 //
T09kbavk64u:637: utpāṭite śaravane same vyuptaṃ tilādhakam // KAvk_64.321 //
T09kbavk64u:643: yayāsya petur mukuṭe divyāḥ kusumavṛṣṭayaḥ // KAvk_64.324 //
T09kbavk64u:645: punas tadvañcanāyaiva tāṃ tāṃ yuktim acintayat // KAvk_64.325 //
T09kbavk64u:646: dadhati vipulāścarye maunaṃ hasanti satāṃ stutau malinavadanāḥ kīrtyutkarṣe vrajanti vivāditām
T09kbavk64u:647: api guṇaśatair nārādhyante viruddhadhiyaḥ paraṃ paraparibhavakṣobhārambhasthirābhiniveśinaḥ sa tam ūce prabhāvo 'yaṃ divyaḥ prakaṭitas tvayā /
T09kbavk64u:650: kinnarīṇāṃ sthitāṃ madhye gṛhāṇa nijavallabhām // KAvk_64.328 //
T09kbavk64u:651: ity uktas tena sa punaḥ kinnarīśatapañcakam /
T09kbavk64u:653: tāsāṃ madhye parijñāya sa jagrāha manoharām /
T09kbavk64u:655: devo 'yam iti niścitya tatas taṃ kinnareśvaraḥ /
T09kbavk64u:656: tuṣṭas tasmai dadau divyaratnaiḥ saha manoharām // KAvk_64.331 //
T09kbavk64u:658: jāyāsakhas tam āmantrya kumāraḥ svapuraṃ yayau // KAvk_64.332 //
T09kbavk64u:661: putraṃ tataś caritacandrasitātapatre rājye 'bhiṣicya paritāpaharaṃ prajānāṃ /
T09kbavk64u:663: prāptābhiṣekaṃ sudhanam prabhāte taṃ saptaratnāni pṛthupratāpam /
T09kbavk64u:665: sa bodhisattvaḥ sudhano 'ham eva yaśodharā sāpi manoharābhūt tadviprayogavyasanānalārtiḥ kāmānubandhād iyatī mayāptā // KAvk_64.336 //
T09kbavk64u:666: tasmāt kāmaḥ kamalavadanānetraparyantavāsī varjyaḥ sadbhiḥ śamaṃrgavadhūbandhakeliḥ kirātaḥ
T09kbavk64u:667: sphūrjatpuṣpaprasarajarajaḥpuñjahālāhalāgrair lokaḥ śokavyasanaviśikhair mohanair yena viddhaḥ iti bhikṣugaṇaḥ svayaṃ jinena svakathāṃ tāṃ viniveditāṃ niśamya /
T09kbavk64u:668: sarasaṃ pṛthumūlam eva mene śataśākhasya manobhavam bhavasya //
